WorkItem.Description:
I ran into the same problem that I had before after I downloaded the latest source.
 
I don't know which version of FCKeditor that is included in the source, but it will not work under IE7.  
 
When I use FCKeditor version 2.3.3, it works fine.  When using 2.4 it crashes giving me the errors that I reported yesterday.
 
For now, I will have to keep deleting the FCKeditor folder and put 2.3.3 in.
